text: "Mera naam Aakarss singh, Gopalganj, Bihar se." "Kya common washroom mein hilaane ko milega?" "Tu Punjab se hai, gaana gaa ke suna" "Tere room mein aane se pehle kabhi sochta nahi hoon, apna samajh ke". Pehle din se hi pata lag gaya tha ki aur koi bane na bane, yeh chutiya 4 saal takk pakka dost rahega. Ab pata chal gaya hai ki koi aur dost rahe na rahe, yeh maadarchod poori zindagi dost rahega. Zindagi bhar milte rahenge aur sama banate rahenge <3
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Apna discussion hamesha ajeeb topics par hi kyu hua hai? Porn, masturbation, etc etc. Tu kaafi lively aadmi hai bhai, mujhe hangout krna kaafi mazaa lagta tha. Mostly because tu mere bekaar se bekaar joke par bhi hass deta tha xD Jab bhi mujhe lagega mere jokes ka level gir raha, mai tujhe call karke khud ke baare mein acha feel kr liya krunga, chalega?
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: "Oye bsdk, chal party ka plan banate hain". Tere saath first year mein kitne zyada party ke plan banke cancel huye hain vaise. Shayad ek hi baar 1st year ke baad party kar paye hain ikkathe lekin tere saath definitely aur parties karni hain life mein. Jitna chill insaan tu hai, mujhe lagta hai aage mil hi jayenge kabhi na kabhi aur maze mein ghumne jayenge aur parties krenge.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Mishra ji, aap bahut hi pyare aadmi hain. Isliye aapko IITK mein log sabse jyada pyar karte hain. Mujhe yaad hai ek din shayad mera mood acha nahi tha third sem mein quiz ke baad toh aap mere room aake mere saath HIMYM ka poora episode dekh kar gaye the taaki mood sahi ho jaye mera. Bss aise hi selflessly logon ki help karte rahein. Hopefully, milenge aur samay banayenge aage bhi.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Aaye mere lund. Fresher's se dekh raha hoon, tujhse energetic dancer nahi mila. Tera aur Aakarsh ka duo, muaaah. Shayad final year ki koi party nahi thi jisme sabne bola na ho, "Rawat missing hai bss, bc ne maa chudaali". Isse hi pata chalta hai sab tujhse kitna pyaar karte hain. Bohat lambi zindagi hai bhai, milna chalta rahega <3
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Sorry if I offended you kabhi, I was just trying to be funny :P Shaadi mein zaroor bulana xD
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: "Tum karlo try, agar samajh na aya toh mai Sanghi se puchta hoon" Bhai, hamesha help karne ke liye shukriya. Aur tujhe kitna bhi Randi rona lage, mai bata raha hoon mera nahi hoga xD
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Ojha Baba!! I clearly remember the first time I met you in the third semester. You seemed like a pretty decent guy( par baad mein lodu nikla). Teri life kaafi rollercoaster types chali and I have to admit tune jhaant ache se handle nahi kiya( though last mein it turned out pretty fine) Intern ki BT se shayad kaafi ache dost ho gye the I guess. Tere â€œPole danceâ€ se impress ho gaya tha na mai xD. Hopefully, aage bhi chalti rahegi yeh dosti.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Meri college life ka pehla dost. Pehla dost jisse baat karne mein darr nahi laga, jiske saath yaadein ginne baithu toh college ke pehle din se shuru karna padta hai, jiske saath poora semester kab nikal gaya pata hi nahi chala. Pehla dost jisse shayad pehli baar bhai wali vibes ayi. Pehle semester mein HSS wali chai se leke aakhri semester mein Civil wali laudi ke course saath mein kiye hain. I know grades mein thoda bohat difference raha xD, par maze toh bhai classes mein baraabar hi karte the. Baahar logon ke saamne jitni marzi bakchodi pelta ho, room mein aake chandu hamesha dil ki baat karta hai. Padhai, Paisa, Ghar, Bandiyan, Dosti sabkuch toh humne first year mein hi discuss karke khatam kr diya tha. Kisko hi pata hai logon ke saamne alpha male banne wala launda, actual mein kaafi thoughtful aur caring hai. Umeed hai apni poori zindagi aise hi baat hoti rahegi. Tere bachhon ko teri lund harkaton ke baare mein batana bhi toh hai, BT boi. Khair baat ho na ho lekin iss college ki kitaab ka pehla chapter hamesha tujhse hi shuru hoga.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Where did it all start? I seriously have no clue but I do remember one thing, you are one of the very few people who gave me positive vibes throughout my college life. All my hometown friends remember you as â€œWohi pune wala dost na, jiske mom tere liye aam laye the". Iâ€™m someone who finds it difficult to settle in new places(contrary to what it seems like to other people), but I remember when I was coming to Pune, I was calm. I was calm because I knew youâ€™d be there for me, no matter how difficult it might be for you, youâ€™d come and help me settle, at least emotionally. You're logical and emotional at the same time. Someone who canâ€™t hide his disappointment or joy.(I like that alot about you) Believe me, "Hona chahiye" is one of the best groups I've found and usme 5 ke 5 kaafi special hain mere liye. I literally hope ki hum aise hi ache dost rahein.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: "Ayush acha aadmi hai''. Well, I don't remember a single discussion with people about you in which I didn't say this, maybe because I literally believed this, and I still do. No matter if we were in touch or not, I never gave a single thought before asking for any favour because I've been so sure you'd help. Cheers to our discussions and Randi Rona(Mere case mein ek aur tere case mein 4-5 ladkiyon ka :P). Avoiding the customary hair joke because ab toh aa gaye hain. Dosti cycle stand se shuru hoke, 4 saal baad jaane se just pehle mere room mein vibe krne tkk chali(Though tu uske baad bus stop bhi gaya tha GH wale but okay :P). And finally, a message for your kids, "Papa bahut simping karte the, don't believe him if he says otherwise''.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Soneria, I hope whenever you meet me in the future, you meet me with the same energy and smile. All the best, bud.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Kuch dost, dost nahi, bhai hote hain. Har ladhayi buri nahi hoti, kuch ladhaiyon par tere jaisa lab partner bhi mil jaata hai. â€œBhadwiâ€ Aunty ka mazaak udhate udhate, ek bhadwa dost zindagi bhar ke liye mil gaya. Zindagi mein shayad hi koi dost milta hai, jo tumhare liye dil se acha sochta hai aur tumhari khushi mein khush hota hai, khush hoon ki ek aisa dost mil gaya hai. Not sure the journey of college was great or not but Iâ€™m glad it was with you.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: TA partners, intern partners. Tu cse ke sabse chill bandon mein toh hai sach mein. Ek positivity ki feel hamesha aati hai tujhse baat karke. Aise hi rehna. Hopefully, yeh dosti ki shuruat hai, aur gehri hoti rahegi aur ek doosre ko aur jaan ne ka mauka milega. Aur haan, woh Priyal ka comment yaad hai? xD Sorry for that.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Tu unn logon mein se hai jisne ghar se IITK ka transition ek dum smooth aur yaadgaar bana diya. Iâ€™m pretty sure ki poore saal mein ek baar bhi na ladhne wale roommates, IITK mein kahin nahi milenge. Umeed hai kisi din, phir room mate banenge aur â€œdie motherfucker dieâ€ par head bang aur vibe krte huye sabko preshan krenge. Phirse same room mein baith ke chat krte krte, ek doosre ko dekh ke hassenge. Par haan, iss baar fan(or maybe AC) tez hi chala liya krenge.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: â€œOye keede maadarchodâ€. Tu unn kuch logon mein se hai jisko shayad mai first year mein utna pasand nahi karta tha(aur shayad tu bhi) lekin 4 saal mein sabse ache doston mein tha. There was a point jab campus mein sirf 2-3 din bache the when I realised that thereâ€™s a possibility ki hamari kabhi baat na ho. Tabhi maine pucha tha tujhse ki valorant kaise khelte hain taaki shayad isi bahane baat ho jayegi aage. College ke hangout ko compensate karne ke liye aage kabhi ghoom lenge. Hopefully, aage baat hoti rahegi.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: "Gandhi tu kabhi disappoint nahi karta". Daaru, dance aur laundiyabaazi se bhari apni college life mein tune apni aur hamari life ko interesting banane ke liye kaafi kaand kiye hi hain. I'm pretty sure aage bhi karta rahega xD. Tbh, you've become one of my most trusted friends and that too in a couple of months <3. Gehrai Badhti rehni chahiye :P
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: "Agar kaafi mood kharaab hai toh Gavish se baat krle na". Kharaab mood mein tujhse baat krna aur kuch hi der mein bezzati krke aur krwa ke saara mood theek ho jana, bss yehi dosti hai apni. Yeh dosti shabdon ki mohtaaz nahi hai, bss ek ehsaas hai.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: â€œTu jab bhi mere saath hota hai, khush rehta haiâ€ Gazab overconfidence hai Gujju tere mein. A kash ki mai kisi apne se intelligent dost se dosti karta, toh exam mein same questions karke dono B  na lagwa rahe hote. Tujhse ek aadh project mein thoda bahut kaam karwa liya, college life safal ho gayi. Aur haan, maan leta hoon tujhse baat karke dil khush toh ho jaata hai. Social aur academic life ka discussion toh zindagi bhar chalta hi rahega. Mere pessimism ko tune hi kam karna hai zindagi bhar. Baaki jis din tera â€˜Gosaiâ€™ ho jayega, call kr lena, sambhaal lunga <3
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Youâ€™ve been a good friend. To be honest, memories kam aur randi rona zyada jhela hai tune mera and thank god it was you! Agar koi aur hota toh shayad samajh na paata. We didnâ€™t have our share of fun though, hopefully agli baar jab milenge aur saare bache plans execute honge toh krenge maze. Take care till thenðŸ–¤(With a black heart)
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Yeh Ghissu naam maine hi diya hai na? Tujhse mehnati ladka nahi dekha maine aur iss baat ko mai hamesha admire karta tha aur rahunga. First year mein RM, library, DOAA ke baahaar kya mast discussions kiye hain na humne? Kabhi pucha nahi, woh bandi ka kya bana? xD. Tujhe porn dikhane ki try karte huye video hai mere pass abhi bhi, abhi tkk nahi dekhi kya porn? Tere saath milne ki dikkat nahi hogi hopefully because tu kisi din ghar par bula lega aur mai aa bhi jayunga bina do baar soche. Tabb tkk, apna dhyaan rakhna.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: "Agar kabhi ditch kiya toh gaand maar lena" Kehna ek baat hai, tune karke dikha diya. Agar placement mein baithta toh sirf tere bharose par baithta. Kuch logon se baat kam, dosti zyada hoti hai. Bss aisi hi kuch dosti apni hai and I'm pretty sure aage bhi rahegi.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Hor jasse ki haal? Apaan tan chalo college toh pehlan de dost aa, college toh baad v rahange hi. Hopefully, iss time tkk saare gile shikwe maaf ne. Kisi din khedan chaliye?
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Kisi ke liye bura na chahna, dil se help karna aur sabki respect karna. Duniya mein bohat kam log aise milte hain. Fourier transform, huh? 4 saal mein bakchodi aur galiyan toh seekh gaya hai, lekin woh innocence wahin hai. Jab bhi life mein kisi ki high pitched awaaz sununga, teri yaad ayegi pakka xD. Poore college mein Dhoni aur Shruti Jain ka sabse bada fan tu hi hoga. By the way, mujhe bhi Dhoni pasand hai, bss mai tujhe tang karne ke liye bezzati krta tha uski. Par tu maane ya na maane, wing mein cricket khelte time toh tu haar jaata tha mujhse :P Baat hogi ya nahi hogi, pata nahi par jab bhi tujhe yaad krunga,  yeh sochke ro pakka dunga ki ek chhote bhai jaisa pyara sa dost tha.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Mota maadarchod
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: "Bhai do line likhna, par dil se likhna". Shayad in 4 saalon mein kabhi koi dikkat nahi ayi ek doosre se, kitna smoothly nikal gaya( mostly because mai sutte club ka member nahi tha :P). Tu bahut sweet hai yaar, aise hi rehna. Wing ka sabse pehla get together teri shaadi par hi hoga, bula lena mujhe bhi xD. Hopefully, milte rahenge.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Aur sunao mere shayar dost, kem cho? Limited interaction hua hai, par inhi chote chote lamhon se toh zindagi banti hai.  Sapne tumhare bade hain, aise hi mehnat karte rehna. Umeed hai agli baar milenge toh Nikunj-Jay ke mutual jaankaaron ki tarah nahi, doston ki taraah milenge.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text:
Gonna write a long memoir, but I want the bottom line to be â€œNikunj Maadarchod haiâ€.
College ke pehle din mess mein paani girane se leke aakhri din gandhi ke room mein beer girane tkk, tere har fuck up par hassi bhi ayi aur thoda gussa bhi.  Yeh college ka silsila OAT mein naachne se shuru hua, aur basketball court mein naachne par khatam. Bond toh hum ladkiyon ki baaton par hi kiye the. Ladkiyan badalti rahin, gehrai badhti rahi. Asli dosti toh apni hi hai, baaki sab toh bss koshish kr rahe hain. Sab idhar campus bulane ke liye thanks bol rahe, woh toh vaise koi aur Presi bhi bulwa leta xD. Rule toh tujhe pata hi hai, this â€˜nok-jhokâ€™ is directly proportional to gehrai. Agar gehrai moments yaad karne baitha toh aadhi college life likhni pad jayegi. Ek baat se bohot khush hoon ki dosti ka â€œgraphâ€ kabhi neeche nahi aya, clearly hum outlier hain uss theory mein. Kaash logon ke beech ek doosre ka thoda better opinion banate, khair uske liye toh ab der ho gayi hai. Mai isse thoda better aur emotional memoir likhta but aaj kal utna emotional nahi ho paa raha, thanks to you. Aur I know mai kitna bhi acha memoir likhta tu last mein yehi bolega, â€œTujhse better expect kiya thaâ€ toh yehi conclude kar deta hoon. Umeed hai aage bhi ek doosre ko ghatiya advice dete rahenge aur fucked up situations par hasste rahenge.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Pandey enters the room, "Abey yeh garmi kitni hai, smell kahan se aa rahi hai, fan dheere kyun haiâ€¦" + 5 other mistakes in the environment. Jab bhi hum dono ghumte the saath toh mujhe lagta tha ki itni sahi vibe hai apni, hum itna kam kyu hangout karte hain. Phir tu koi Punjabi joke maar deta tha and mai sochta tha okay, thatâ€™s why xD. Pandey tu bohat sorted aadmi hai bhai aur mujhe seriously kaafi kuch seekhna hai tujhse. Tune 100 baar yaad dilaya hai woh pehla din jab tu mere room par aya aur maine ignore kar diya(mujhe sach mein nahi yaad). Par 4 saal baad, I guess hum itne ache dost hain ki mai tujhse milne ke liye kahin bhi aa jaunga. I wish ki apni baat ab se zyada ho kyuki vibe toh apni bakchod hai hi aur rahegi hi.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Hey man!. Well, I must say I won't forget that Cs252 scandal my whole life but in the end it turned out pretty fine thankfully. We haven't really talked much but I still look out for your thoughtful WhatsApp status, keep posting those. Best of luck man!
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: You are one of the very few people on the campus who's genuinely good at heart. Someone, who greets you with the same energy and smile every time. I know I won't forget you and you won't let me spam kar karke xD
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Bola tha na, agar khaali dikhegi toh saari jagah bhar dunga. Le aa gaya. When I was pretty sure ki mai college ke saare maadarchod logon se mil chuka hoon, mujhe sabse bade wala mil gaya. Pehle din se milte hi vibe kr rahe hain hum(pata nahi kaise bc). Mujhe finally mujhse 10 times zyada judgemental dost mila jiske saath baithke poore campus ke har launde/laundiya ko judge kr liya. Branch, bandi, stocks, family, paisa, sab discuss kr liya hai. Yeh dosti "Burmese Rnd" se shuru hoke aakhri din tkk dil ki baat krne tkk chali, hopefully aage bhi chalegi. Pyaara aadmi hai vaise tu(Isse zyada taarif expect mat krna life mein). Tere jaise harami marwaadi se zyada kuch expect nahi krta but mai woh Punjabi dost zroor hoon, jo dosti nibhane ke liye kahin bhi aa jayunga.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Rammmmm, umeed hai yeh dekhte hi thodi si smile aa jaaye face par. Tujhe hamesha calm hi dekha hai vaise aur milke hamesha kaafi positive vibes ayi hain. Pata nahi tune kaise manage kiya hamesha calm rehna. Hopefully, aage milenge aur shayad pehle se zyada interact krenge.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: â€œPata hai ek 300 rank wala hai, jisne physics li haiâ€ Whenever we met, mai tujhse tere A* ka count zaroor puchta tha. Itne A* laane mein mujhe 10-12 degrees lagengi. Sports aur acads, dono mein tumne kamaal kiya hai bhai. Aage bhi life mein chaapte rehna.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Hamara sabse strict IC jisse poori janta darrti thi. Differences rahein hain opinions mein lekin shayad ek mutual respect ke saath. Milenge kisi roz, inn purani yaadon ko taaza karne baithenge.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Agar mai batti mein rehta toh poora time tere bharose hi rehta. Tu kaafi helpful aadmi hai bhai, Pandey Dikshant ki degree bhi tujhe hi de deni chahiye. Tu jitna disciplined aur hardworking hai, I'm pretty sure life mein bohot kuch achieve krega. Tu mast badminton khelta hai vaise, lekin agli baar haar jaayega mujhse dekhna. Thanks for being there for everyone in every possible way.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: To be honest, I think you are one of the most selfless and sorted people I've met here. I always had a feeling ki koi aur help kare na kare, tu kabhi mana nahi karega. Just stay the same. Hum toh hopefully milte hi rahenge. Kabhi ghar aa jana, FIFA khelenge(tu sikha dena).
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Semester ke kuch hi din milte the, mostly mid-sem/end-sem ke time, lekin kya mast baatein krte the bhai xD. Umeed hai zindagi mein kisi din milenge aur library ke baahar jaise ghumte waqt samay baandhte the, vaisa hi krenge. Maintain the same energy in life :)
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Not sure if we have the best of opinions about each other but I really wish to meet again at some point in life to give a fresh start to our friendship. Aur haan, jab bhi milenge T.T zaroor khelenge :)
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: "DD..DD" yaad hai? Kitna tang karta tha bhai tu. Vaise badminton ki practice kar raha, agli baar milenge toh haraa dunga pakka.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Intern partners! Fun fact! Maine aaj tkk tujhe real mein nahi dekha. Intern par kaafi maza aya, shayad intern offline hoti toh aur maze karte. Hopefully, aage jald hi milenge aur maze karenge. Best of luck for the future and I sincerely hope you achieve your goals.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Jaate jaate tu bhi bitching club ka part bann hi gaya xD. 4th year mein kaafi acha interaction aur sachmein mazaa aya. Naachte rehna aur apne charm se ladkiyan ghayal karte rehna.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Apni college life vaisi nahi nikli jaisi humne sochi thi par Iâ€™m glad hum abhi tkk utne hi ache dost hain despite all the fights :P. I know that you know ki life mein kabhi bhi koi dikkat ho, teri ek call par mai aajayunga(Vaise mere se pehle tu hi rota hua aa jayega xD)
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Ek baat dil se kahunga ki aaj tkk life mein tujhse acha insaan nahi mila hai and Iâ€™m pretty sure aage bhi nahi milega. Tujhse baat karke hamesha dil khush ho jata hai, jaisa hai vaisa hi rehna. Hopefully, zindagi ke kisi mod par phir milenge aur iss baar mere room mein party krenge.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Agar tu uss din mujhe aur Dewansh ko ice cream khila deta toh shayad aaj yeh naam na dalta. Hopefully, ab tujhe woh din yaad karke gussa nahi ayega, shayad face par halki si smile aa jaye. Harlem shake ke wing captain se lekar, yeh safar tere room mein poori wing vibe karne takk chala. Umeed hai yeh vibe aise hi barkaraar rahegi. Aur haan, Basketball thoda pyaar se khela kar bhai, please :'( Jaate jaate puch hi leta hoon, "Eh tatti tera naam kya hai?"
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Poore ek saal tak har course mein partner rahe, I just wanna say apna dhyaan rakha kar aur zinda rehne ki koshish kar xD. And again, it's krunga and not kruga xD
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: Gote tu first year se fourth year mein shayad apni dosti kaafi better ho gayi hai. Wing ki pehli GPL se aakhri din tere jaane par rone tkk, sab yaad rahega. "chalein khelne?" Kisi din mai aise hi message krunga, uss din tujhe mai badminton mein zroor haraunga.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text: We played a game together a couple of years back, and I want the record to state that I won :P(or maybe we both lost). Baat kam ho ya zyada, kuch log Dil se dost hote hain. Zyada milte nahi the, lekin jab bhi milte the besties ki taraah vibe kiye. Hopefully, aage bhi karte rahenge.
author: Abhishek  Bhatia

text:
Jab tu successful hoke TV par gyaan pelta hua dikhega, tab mere bachhe tujhe recognize kar ke bolenge â€œYeh Yugesh chachu hi hain naâ€. Hopefully, itni baat hoti rahegi ki mere bachhon ko tera pata hoga. Well, I say this to very few people but haan agar tu na hota toh shayad college life different hoti. You had a great impact on how I turned out( Good or bad, idk :P). Kaafi intense discussions ki hain tere saath, not gonna lie sab yaad hain aur rahengi. Teri weird advice se leke tere saath course mein BT share karne tkk, sab yaad rahega.  Par I still donâ€™t know tu IITK ki har ladki se baat karna kaise manage kar leta tha(Haan karde deny). You know you are special when a song reminds me of you. â€œPeaceful easy feelingâ€ sunke hamesha apni woh vibe yaad ayegi. Aur haan, lambi zindagi hai Yugesh bhaiya toh,
